name: Libman FlexTech Broom with Dustpan Combo Set for Sweeping Indoor and Outdoor Floors, Pet, Dog Hair Broom, 55” Precision Angle Broom, 3 Piece Handle, 11" Wide, 10.25" Wide Dust Pan
short_description: BROOM: Featuring 5” long, FlexTech fibers made from recycled plastic bottles, these fibers are precisely cut, and flagged with split-tips to collect fine dirt, pet hair & dust. 11" wide sweeping path

DUSTPAN: The 10.25" wide Dustpan features a molded lip to seal against your floor to ensure the dirt, pet hair, and debris wind up in the Dustpan and not under it. The Dustpan also features anti-static properties, reducing the amount of dirt and debris that stick to the pan
EASY ASSEMBLY: Instruction sheet provided for assembly of the Broom handle. Total height of assembled Broom = 56”
MADE IN THE USA: This Libman FlexTech Broom and Dustpan Set is Made in the USA with a Globally Sourced Handle

AMERICAS’ #1 BROOM BRAND: Libman is Americas #1 Broom Brand based on Circana 52 Week MULO data ending 12/31/23. Based on Internal Testing, our Brooms remove over 99% of fine dust and debris with one sweep
product_description: The Libman FlexTech Broom & Dustpan Combo Set - the ultimate cleaning tool for all your indoor and outdoor needs. This set includes a durable 11" wide broom head, a 10.25" wide dustpan, and a 49” long handle to ensure that you have everything you need to tackle any mess. Our brooms are specifically designed to make cleaning up after your pets a breeze. The densely packed bristles easily pick up debris from most hard surface floors, making it the perfect tool for any situation. The dustpan features anti-static properties preventing the buildup of dirt and hair on the dustpan. This Broom and Dustpan can be used indoor and outdoor, from sweeping up crumbs in the kitchen to tackling leaves on the patio, this broom and dustpan set is built to handle it all. In addition, its compact size and lightweight design, it’s easy to store and use whenever you need it. Don’t waste any more time struggling with inferior brooms and dustpans. Upgrade to the Libman FlexTech Broom & Dustpan Combo Set today and experience the difference for yourself! Libman is Americas #1 Broom Brand based on Circana 52 Week MULO data ending 12/31/23.
